Versatile Usage: Ideal for soups, dals, khichdi, and salads

Prepare khichdi for a comforting and nutritious dish

name: Chana Dal
description: Wholesome Goodness in Every Bite! Made from the finest high-quality split chickpeas, our Channa Dal brings a rich, nutty flavor and firm texture to your kitchen. Packed with protein, fiber, and essential nutrients, it is not just food, it is nourishment for your family, straight from nature's heart. Whether you are making a warm, comforting soup, a flavorful curry, or a cherished traditional dish, every meal becomes a moment of love and care.
key_features: High Protein & Fiber: Supports muscle health and digestion
Rich Nutty Flavor: Adds authentic taste to traditional dishes
Versatile Usage: Perfect for soups, curries, and traditional meals
ingredients: 100% Pure Channa Dal (Split Chickpeas) - No additives, no preservatives, just natural goodness!
serving_ideas: Cook as a traditional dal with spices for authentic flavors
Use in soups and curries for a hearty, nutritious meal
Make chana dal fry or tadka for a protein-rich side dish
Blend into batters for pakoras or fritters
